CommuniKate is heavily documented, you can read all about its design and use in our 80page manual, and play with our online demos of both CK20 and CK12 before you download.

The demos are fully interactive online versions of the page set. There is a Portuguese version of the CK20 demo, and we have volunteers currently translating for a range of languages. If you are interested in helping us translate the page set to any other language weâ€™d love to hear from you.
